name: basic-web-scraper
description: I have/had a few ideas for apllications that could use a web scraper, hence the need to build one. I built a basic web scraper that  - uses Cheerio to scrape the selected data from the enetered URL  - then uses fs to write the data to file ie data.json  - set up an express server to hadnle sending the parsed data to the frontend  - display frontend using basic JavaScript and HTML CSS
